text: comments like this: "*Julia*...[is] a specialty language though IMO, if you're not doing something scientific I'm not sure it makes much sense to learn."

elements.text: ...[is] a specialty language though IMO, if you're not doing something scientific I'm not sure it makes much sense to learn."

text: Personally I don't disagree with it, for most other domains I can think of, there are languages that are more mature and specialized in that domain

text: The implication is that it's something inherent about Julia rather than the ecosystem though

text: I’ve been using Julia for general programming for almost 6 years. I really hate the idea that Julia is or worse *should* be a niche language.
